pageContext.claim: “We have some incredibly talented people that know environment and what we're doing probably better than any people on Earth. From day one, my administration has made it a top priority to ensure that America has among the very cleanest air and cleanest water on the planet. We want the cleanest air. We want crystal-clean water, and that's what we're doing and that's what we're working on so hard.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a stretch. Environmental advocates say Trump has an “abysmal environmental track record,” pointing to increased air pollution and greenhouse gas emissions.
